oracle.pgx.api

Class PgxEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pgx.api.internal.ApiObject
      • oracle.pgx.api.PgxEntity<java.lang.Long>
        • oracle.pgx.api.PgxEdge

  • public class PgxEdge
extends PgxEntity<java.lang.Long>
    An edge of a PgxGraph.

        public <ID> PgxVertex<ID> getDestination()
        Blocking version of getDestinationAsync(). Calls getDestinationAsync() and waits for the returned PgxFuture to complete.

        Gets the destination vertex.
        Returns:

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Blocking version of getLabelAsync(). Calls getLabelAsync() and waits for the returned PgxFuture to complete.

      • getLabelAsync

        public PgxFuture<java.lang.String> getLabelAsync()
        Gets the label.
        Returns:
        the edge label.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this graph does not have any labels.

      • getSource

        public <ID> PgxVertex<ID> getSource()
        Blocking version of getSourceAsync(). Calls getSourceAsync() and waits for the returned PgxFuture to complete.

      • getSourceAsync

        public <ID> PgxFuture<PgxVertex<ID>> getSourceAsync()
        Gets the source vertex.
        Returns:
        the source vertex.

      • getVertices

        public <ID> Pair<PgxVertex<ID>,PgxVertex<ID>> getVertices()
        Blocking version of getVerticesAsync(). Calls getVerticesAsync() and waits for the returned the returned PgxFuture to complete.

      • getVerticesAsync

        public <ID> PgxFuture<Pair<PgxVertex<ID>,PgxVertex<ID>>> getVerticesAsync()
        Gets both vertices of this edge as a pair. In the directed case, the first part of the pair is the source and the second one the destination vertex.
        Returns:
        the source and the destination vertex as a pair
